Package com.piotrzawada.BarberShopBookingSystem

Interface BookingRepo

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Booking,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Booking,Long>
public interface BookingRepo extends org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Booking,Long>
This interface defines the contract for accessing and managing Bookings entities in the database. It extends the CrudRepository.
Version:
0.3.0
Author:
Piotr Zawada

    findByLocalDateTime(LocalDateTime localDateTime)
    Retrieves a Booking associated with the given LocalDataTime
    LocalDateTime
    findLatestDateTime()
    Retrieves the latest (maximum) local date and time of all bookings.This custom query is executed to retrieve the maximum local date and time among all bookings stored in the data source.

    • findLatestDateTime

      @Query("SELECT MAX(b.localDateTime) FROM Booking b") LocalDateTime findLatestDateTime()
      Retrieves the latest (maximum) local date and time of all bookings.This custom query is executed to retrieve the maximum local date and time among all bookings stored in the data source.
      Returns:
      LocalDateTime of latest booking.

    • findByAppUserNullAndLocalDateTimeBetween

      List<Booking> findByAppUserNullAndLocalDateTimeBetween(LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime)
      Retrieves a list of bookings with no assigned app user and local date and time within a specified range. This custom query is executed to find all bookings that meet the following criteria: - The app user is not assigned (null). - The local date and time of the booking fall within the specified range
      Parameters:
      startDateTime - startDateTime The start of the local date and time range.
      endDateTime - endDateTime The end of the local date and time range.
      Returns:
      list of bookings objects that meet the specified criteria.
